titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent disqualification of low-income housing units for purposes of the low-income housing credit solely by reason of certain assignments of dependency deductions by full-time student single parents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/22/1996--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prevent disqualification of low-income housing units for purposes of the low-income housing credit due to the assignment of dependency deductions by full-time student single parents.
